alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 6:05AM EDT until March 24 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...MIXED PRECIPITATION EXPECTED TODAY AND TONIGHT... .A couple of waves of low pressure will move past the region today and tonight. While low elevations will see mainly rain, elevations especially above 1000 feet will see and mixture of snow, sleet, and freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch. Total ice accumulations around a trace. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland and androscoggin Counties. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow and ice covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
